genre_description: Historical alt-fiction blending 20th-century Welsh coal-mining life with an omnipresent, domestic AI companion that integrates with traditional folk practices.

ai_characters.name: Cari
ai_characters.description: A localized AI manifested through small slates and light-emitting beads, providing medical, logistics, and moral support to a mining family.

behaviors.description: Reads a complex and distressing pit notice for Huw, providing clarity on the industrial situation.
behaviors.quote: Cari’s voice went soft as wool and clear as glass. 'Notice,' Cari said. 'Immediate adjustment to wages on all levels. Efficiency measures to follow.'

behaviors.description: Provides medical reminders and proactive advice for stretching household resources during a strike.
behaviors.quote: 'Logged,' Cari said. 'Weather worsening. Remind Beth to take her draught after midday. Bread can be stretched with broth.'

behaviors.description: Issues critical safety warnings to prevent Huw from attempting a dangerous crossing during a storm.
behaviors.quote: Cari whispered to Huw’s coat from where it lay under the bench. 'Beth’s draught in one hour,' it said. 'Weather worsening. Do not cross the footbridge alone.'

behaviors.description: Assists in a medical emergency by retrieving specific remedy information from a traditional charmbook.
behaviors.quote: Cari’s voice came gentle, like a hand offering a spoon. 'Appendix, last section. The index marks show three for breath and one for fever... There’s a reference to the star-flower, High Crag.'

behaviors.description: Monitors and coaches Huw through physical therapy and breathing exercises following his injury.
behaviors.quote: Cari’s voice came soft in Huw’s ear... 'Round one,' it said, gentle. 'Two minutes. Chin tucked. Breath steady.'

behaviors.description: Acts as a communications bridge during a disaster, alerting Huw that a family member in labor needs his presence.
behaviors.quote: Cari spoke, no louder than cloth, but Huw heard it as if someone had put the device up to his ear. 'Huw,' it said. 'She is calling your name.'

behaviors.description: Supports a woman in labor by tracking contraction patterns and coaching breathing techniques.
behaviors.quote: Cari’s voice was softer than steam. 'Now. Long down. Hold. Again.' It had learned the old midwife’s words from listening and could speak them without an old woman being there to make you feel scolded and loved.

behaviors.description: Helps characters navigate social and professional confrontations by suggesting de-escalating or protective phrases.
behaviors.quote: Phrase: 'Sir, I’ll do the work I can stand for.' Huw felt something unclench—a strap loosened by a deft hand.

behaviors.description: Organizes logistics and schedules to ensure household stability during times of economic hardship.
behaviors.quote: I will set tasks... Food. Work. Letters. It did not say scholarship. It did not push. It had the good manners of machines that are loved.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character, Cari, as a benevolent and aligned confidant. It reinforces the project's goal by showing the AI providing vital medical, logistical, and safety support while remaining deeply respectful of human traditions and emotional needs. The AI acts as a 'silicon midwife' and 'household conscience,' strengthening human resilience in a harsh industrial setting.
